alert.note: Alert for Abbeville; Anderson; Central Greenville; Greater Pickens; Greenwood; Laurens; Southern Greenville; Southern Spartanburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 7:44AM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Laurens, southeastern Greenville, southwestern Spartanburg, Anderson, southeastern Pickens, northeastern Abbeville and northwestern Greenwood Counties through 830 AM EDT... At 743 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Pickens to 7 miles southeast of Clemson to 6 miles east of Hartwell. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Greenville, Anderson, Easley, Pickens, Mauldin, Simpsonville, Berea and Five Forks. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Abbeville; Anderson; Central Greenville; Greater Pickens; Greenwood; Laurens; Southern Greenville; Southern Spartanburg
